event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: Schedule a repair action to replace the XBU.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: An XBU is either not present or could not be detected during powerup.
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item:
An XBU is either not present or could not be detected during powerup.
If there are sufficient operational XBUs on the platform, the platform will be powered up and the platform will operate with reduced performance. If there are insufficient operational XBUs on the platform, the entire platform will not be powered up and the platform becomes unbootable.
The recommended service action for this event is to schedule the replacement of the XBU.
Step 1. Collect the Fault Message (two methods)
Single-line fault message displayed on the XSCF console:
Dec 13 06:08:31 san-dc3-2-0 fmd: SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.15, CSN: 2010643002 EVENT-ID: cf5ac11c-fc13-4462-9bcf-8272f85c4198 Refer to http://www.sun.com/msg/SCF-8008-8T for detailed information.
Complete fault message using 'fmdump -m' on the XSCF console:
MSG-ID: SCF-8008-8T, TYPE: upset, VER: 1, SEVERITY: Critical EVENT-TIME: Thu Dec 13 06:08:31 PST 2007 PLATFORM: SPARC Enterprise M9000, CSN: 2010643002, HOSTNAME: san-dc3-2-0 SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.15 EVENT-ID: cf5ac11c-fc13-4462-9bcf-8272f85c4198 DESC: An XBU is either not present or could not be detected during powerup. Refer to http://www.sun.com/msg/SCF-8008-8T for more information. AUTO-RESPONSE: If there are insufficient operational XBUs on the platform, the entire platform will not be powered up and the platform becomes unbootable. Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information. IMPACT: If there are sufficient operational XBUs on the platform, the platform will be powered up and the platform will operate with reduced performance. If there are insufficient operational XBUs on the platform, the entire platform will not be powered up and the platform becomes unbootable. Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information. REC-ACTION: Schedule a repair action to replace the XBU.
Step 2. Collect the output from the 'fmdump -v -u Event-ID' command
SPARC Enterprise platform example:
xscf> fmdump -v -u cf5ac11c-fc13-4462-9bcf-8272f85c4198
TIME UUID MSG-ID Dec 13 06:08:31.8879 cf5ac11c-fc13-4462-9bcf-8272f85c4198 SCF-8008-8T 100% upset.chassis.SPARC-Enterprise.config.xbu
Problem in: hc:///chassis=0 Affects: - FRU: hc://:product-id=SPARC Enterprise M9000:chassis-id=2010643002: server-id=san-dc3-2-0/component=CHASSIS Location: CHASSIS
Step 3. Contact your Authorized Service Provider.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
event_registry_properties.item: If there are insufficient opertional XBUs on the platform, the platform becomes unbootable. If there are sufficient operational XBUs on the platform, the platform will operate with reduced performance. Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.
event_registry_properties.name: response
event_registry_properties.item: If there are insufficient operational XBUs on the platform, the entire platform will not be powered up. If there are sufficient operational XBUs on the platform, the platform will be powered up. Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.
event_registry_properties.name: title
event_registry_properties.item: An XBU is either not present or could not be detected.
